title: Cord With Tassel, 1701–50
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Sword carrier made of long white silk cord trimmed with elaborate tassels of gold, sequins and cut glass. Bodies of tassels made of gold thread, and the skirts are made of twisted gold threads. Cords furnished with silk and gold rings to slip and adjust cords for use as a sword carrier.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cord With Tassel, 1701–50.
1701–50. Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique:. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-58-10.
